messages.title: THE PROGRESS WE'VE MADE TOGETHER AS A NATION SINCE 2010
AN IMPORTANT MESSAGE FROM THERESA MAY TO YOU
messages.content:
Getting on with the job of securing the best possible deal from Brexit is vital. Our future prosperity, our place in the world, and our standard of living all depend on getting the Brexit deal right.

And with your help, together we can make it work.

We will:
✓ Take back control of our borders, our laws and our money
✓ Sign new trade deals around the world with old friends and new partners
✓ Ensure we leave in a smooth and orderly way, and that Brexit works for you and the whole of the United Kingdom
✓ Provide as much clarity as possible at every stage of the process, while maintaining a strong negotiating hand

Getting Brexit right matters because it will decide whether or not our children have a safe, secure and prosperous future.

Because only with a good deal from Brexit can we keep our growing economy and all the public services we rely on: well-paid jobs, more affordable housing, a good school place for every child, and a strong economy paying for a strong NHS.

The only way you can ensure we have the strong and stable leadership to get this right is by backing me, and voting for my Conservative candidate in your local area.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: with crime down by a third

issues.brexitEurope: Take back control of our borders, our laws and our money. Sign new trade deals around the world with old friends and new partners. Ensure we leave in a smooth and orderly way, and that Brexit works for you and the whole of the United Kingdom. Provide as much clarity as possible at every stage of the process, while maintaining a strong negotiating hand. EU leaders agree on tough stance at special Brexit summit.

issues.education: a good school place for every child
issues.health: a strong economy paying for a strong NHS
issues.lawCrime: Safer Streets with crime down by a third

images.caption: EU leaders agree on tough stance at special Brexit summit
